sentences.sContent: His attentive behaviour to herself and his sisters convinced her that their welfare was dear to him, and, for a long time, she firmly relied on the liberality of his intentions.
sentences.sContent_eng: His attentive behaviour to herself and his sisters convinced her that their welfare was dear to him, and, for a long time, she firmly relied on the liberality of his intentions.
sentences.sCn: 他这样对待继母和妹妹们，足以说明他多么关心她们的幸福。 有好长一段时间，她对他的慷慨豁达坚信不疑。 。

synos.tran: 慷慨，大方；心胸宽阔，胸怀广阔

remMethod.val: 来自liberal(adj. 慷慨的； 开明的)

words.tran: 自由主义的；慷慨的；不拘泥的；宽大的
大方地；自由地；公平地；充足地
自由化；自由主义化；放宽限制
